channel.title: Skype on KHIA's personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Skype on KHIA's personal Blog

item.title: Skype in docker
item.description: Skype in docker Introduction If you want to separate your personal life from work you would end up with two Skype accounts. However there is a problem. You cannot run multiple instances of Skype on a single computer (as single user). Here comes an idea to run Skype in the docker. Running Skype in docker is also useful for privacy sensitive individuals like myself. Since the Skype application is closed source and sends data in encrypted form.
